## Fragment Delimiters

We use `:` to express hierarchy inside URL fragments. Example: `https://example.com/page#section:subsection` uses `:` to separate a primary section (`section`) from a nested part (`subsection`). The full value appears in an elementâ€™s `id`, e.g. `section:subsection`.

- Sections:
  - Rationale
  - Syntax
  - Examples
  - Do / Don't
  - Interoperability
    - History Behavior
    - Text Fragment Compatibility
  - Accessibility
  - HTML `id` Safety
  - Implementation (Conceptual)
  - Future Considerations
  - FAQ
  - References
